name: EL PASO MOBILITY COALITION
description: Advocates for transportation improvements to section of I-10 that runs through El Paso, TX
sampleDescriptions: Lobbying for transportation funding in the 2021 Transportation Bill for the capping and expanding of the Interstate I-10 running through Downtown El Paso, Texas.
